content: Campus Directory - UC Santa Cruz UC Santa Cruz MyUCSC People Calendars Maps A-Z Index Search Campus Directory About Admissions Academics Research Campus Life Visit UCSC Quick Start Guides Current Students Faculty & Staff Alumni Prospective Students Parents & Family Community Home » Find People » Campus Directory Search for people, departments, or email addresses. « Back To Search Results Kriti Bhargava Assistant Teaching Professor kbharga1@ucsc.edu Pronouns she/her Division Baskin School of Engineering Department/College/Unit Computer Science and Engineering Title Assistant Teaching Professor Affiliation Faculty Faculty Type Regular Faculty Primary Office Location Engineering Building 2543B Mail Stop SOE3 Biography, Education and Training Kriti Bhargava's research focuses on enhancing the real-time performance of IoT applications through the development of intelligent sensor networks that leverage concepts of Edge Computing and Machine Learning. Her work has been applied to fields such as Precision Agriculture and Humanitarian Engineering. Before joining Baskin Engineering, Kriti served as an Assistant Teaching Professor and Director of Computer Science Programs at the University of Connecticut, Stamford campus. She earned her Bachelor's and Master's degrees in Computer Science and Engineering from the LNM Institute of Information Technology, India, in 2014. She completed her PhD in Computer Science from the South East Technological University, Ireland, in 2019, and conducted postdoctoral research at Coventry University, UK.
